comment.body: Yes please! I'm just starting to learn ZeroNet and reading the source code to your projects would be very helpful to learn how this works!!

This would be great! I'm just getting started learning how Zeronet works, so I would love to help out in any way I can, whether by providing a beginner's perspective on the hard-to-understand concepts, proofreading, or just a beta-test audience. Please let me know :-)

How long will it be until Zeronet is self-hosting? E.g. we host the code as a git repository somewhere on Zeronet, or development occurs on a shared site somehow that way?

Probably a bit difficult with little upside... github works really great these days and there are better problems to solve...
@ZAlex Oh, I meant in terms of source code distribution, development, issue tracking; not in terms of sending client updates to folks
